html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-12681998-07-150,  ,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
PrecisEnactment of an ORDER AMENDING THE DIRECTION TO THE CRTC (INELIGIBILITY OF NON-CANADIANS) which will make it explicit that the restrictions on foreign control only apply where non-Canadians own and control more than 20% of the voting shares or occupy more than 20% of the seats on the board, or where the holding company's chairman or C.E.O., etc., is a non-Canadian.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0378 Publication Date: 1998-08-05
Attachments
precis:
Enactment of an ORDER AMENDING THE DIRECTION TO THE CRTC (INELIGIBILITY OF
NON-CANADIANS) which will make it explicit that the restrictions on foreign
control only apply where non-Canadians own and control more than 20% of the
voting shares or occupy more than 20% of the seats on the board, or where
the holding company's chairman or C.E.O., etc., is a non-Canadian.
